text: Ra (saitanale bhandacha) tiniharula'i sahi batobata vicalita gara'irahane chu ra anucita asa dila'irahane chu ra tinala'i sika'une chu ki janavaraharuko kana cirne gara ra bhanne gardachu ki allahabata racana gari'eko rupala'i bigarne gara. Hera jasale allahala'i chadi saitanala'i aphno mitra bana'umcha, tyo khularupama hanima parnecha
